page.title: 08SCHOOL HOBBIES
page.content: Most of the children in Dorothy Barley Junior School have hobbies. We did a survey: our hobbies include majorettes, youth clubs, football, swimming, karate and judo clubs and Brownies. The most favourite hobby is swimming; the second favourite is going to Brownies. The least favourite is the youth club. {(Douglas Chaplin Goes to Cubs) My troop is called the 21st Barking Bellahoy St. Cedds. I go on Friday. I have to pass my bronze, silver and gold arrows. I have learned how to do a reef knot and a round turn two and a half hitches. We also play games, but my most favourite thing of all is when we go to camp. We live in tents and have to cook our own food - which means {BEANS}nearly every day!!!
